backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with admin, media, vehicle, promotion, testimonial, blog, contact, and stats types, integrating authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React app entry point.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation outlining steps for redeploying the frontend canister and verifying all public and admin routes.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard enforcing admin authentication with an optional emergency bypass mode.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout component with collapsible sidebar, navigation, session logout handling, and active route detection.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Utilities to get, set, migrate, and clear admin auth sessions using localStorage and cookies.
Enables a temporary admin bypass mode that auto-creates a Super Admin session when enabled.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied screen with a button redirecting back to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Reusable admin page header showing a title, optional subtitle, and optional action slot.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing blog posts with fields, image picker, and admin comment management.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable text and loading state.
Generic CRUD table with search, custom columns, published status display, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Home: Manages the home page slider images with add, remove, reorder, and select-from-library actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Displays and filters all media assets with search and delete functionality.
Modal for browsing and selecting media assets with search, folder filtering, and error handling.
Button that uploads a selected file, converts it to a data URL, saves it as a media asset, and triggers a callback.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog for adding or editing promotions with form fields, image selection, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog component for creating or editing testimonials with fields for text, rating, image selection, and publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Large dialog for creating or editing vehicles, including basic info, media, variants, specs, and commercial options.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: UI component for toggling commercial vehicle feature booleans via checkboxes and emitting updates.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Editor for vehicle technical specs with inputs and add/remove functionality for additional features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of vehicle variants, including features and price adjustments.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: React Query hooks wrapping admin CRUD operations for vehicles, promotions, testimonials, and more.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Deprecated placeholder hook kept for compatibility with no functional logic.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Handles admin session validation, login flow, and optional emergency bypass session creation.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Debug page to manually test admin login by submitting credentials and displaying results.
Login page handling admin authentication, emergency bypass redirect, and form submission with validation states.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Admin profile editor that loads user data, allows updating name/email/phone, and saves changes via CMS hooks.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Blog management UI with search, create, edit, and delete operations using CMS mutation hooks.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Dashboard showing counts of vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, and credit simulations.
Leads management page to view, search, and delete contact form submissions and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Media manager for uploading assets and configuring homepage banners, including main slider and CTA banner.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting promotions using CRUD dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Admin interface to manage testimonials with filtering, table display, and create/edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin page for managing passenger and commercial vehicles with category filtering, search, and full CRUD operations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays extended visitor statistics in card format with real‑time auto‑refresh and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: Defines layout, sidebar, table, button, and card styling for the admin UI theme.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all public and admin routes using TanStack Router with layout wrappers.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogComment: Form component for submitting blog comments with validation, reset handling, and optional reply mode.
Renders a threaded list of comments with reply capability and nested reply forms.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogInterac: Displays like, share, and comment buttons with counters and local like state persistence.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Collects and submits contact inquiry data with validation, API mutation, and form reset.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for requesting a credit simulation, validating required fields and sending data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that catches fatal errors and shows a fallback UI with a reload option.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeMainBan: Auto-rotating banner slider that cycles through images with simple animation and static fallback.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact info, social links, operational hours, and visitor stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Defines the public page layout with navbar, optional hero, content area, CTA section, footer, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Provides a mobile bottom bar with call, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and navigation menu actions.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Shows a bottom-sheet menu listing main navigation links for mobile.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Creates the top navigation bar with brand logo, links, WhatsApp button, and mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: Displays a styled section title with an icon and customizable text.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Renders a CTA section prompting users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays a simple hero banner with title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Shows a vehicle card with image, price, features, and links to details or WhatsApp consult.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides an actor instance tied to authentication, auto-initializing access control and refreshing related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, clear, and login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as vehicles, blog posts, interactions, comments, promotions, and testimonials.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Implements visitor tracking using mutations to record unique visitors, page views, and periodic presence updates tied to a session ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, global styles, and animations for banners and responsive layout adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Renders a detailed blog post view with likes, shares, comments, and interaction tracking, including comment submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog posts with loading state, basic metadata, and links to individual blog detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Displays detailed info for a commercial vehicle, including variants, pricing adjustments, features, and contact actions.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists all published commercial vehicles grouped into light duty, medium duty, and tractor head categories.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows a contact form along with dealer contact info, location map, and sales consultant details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays home sections including banner slider, featured vehicles, CTA banner, about info, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Shows detailed info for a passenger vehicle with variant selection, pricing, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles in a grid layout with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Renders a list of promotions with images, descriptions, expiry dates, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Displays customer testimonials with ratings, images, and reviews.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public and admin route lists for manual smoke testing and provides utilities to generate checklists and validate router configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color tokens, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, architecture notes, known issues, and constraints for an automotive website with admin CMS and stable persistence.
